ca.ualbert.cs.tasko

Class ViewBidsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.ViewBidsAdapter.BidViewHolder>
      • ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.ViewBidsAdapter

  • public class ViewBidsAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.ViewBidsAdapter.BidViewHolder>
    The class represents a Adapter that is specifically designed to display bid of a particular task in an AdapterView. Allowing the user to accept or reject a particular bid.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewBidsAdapter(android.content.Context context, BidList dmbids, java.util.Map dmMap)
      Constructor for the Adapter, Takes in the context which designates the activity that will use the adapter and a BidList which represents the Bids on a Tasks that will be displayed as well as a Map that is used to match Users with their Ids in order to get preferred users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getItemCount()
      Used to determine the number of ViewHolders the recyclerview will need to display.
      void onBindViewHolder(ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.ViewBidsAdapter.BidViewHolder holder, int position)
      Binds The appropriate Data to the ViewHolder.
      ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.ViewBidsAdapter.BidViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(android.view.ViewGroup parent, int viewType)
      Creates the ViewHolder object that will display the Objects, in this case Bids on a Tasks matching a search query.

      • Methods inherited from class android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter

        bindViewHolder, createViewHolder, getItemId, getItemViewType, hasObservers, hasStableIds, notifyDataSetChanged, notifyItemChanged, notifyItemChanged, notifyItemInserted, notifyItemMoved, notifyItemRangeChanged, notifyItemRangeChanged, notifyItemRangeInserted, notifyItemRangeRemoved, notifyItemRemoved, onAttachedToRecyclerView, onBindViewHolder, onDetachedFromRecyclerView, onFailedToRecycleView, onViewAttachedToWindow, onViewDetachedFromWindow, onViewRecycled, registerAdapterDataObserver, setHasStableIds, unregisterAdapterDataObserver

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewBidsAdapter

        public ViewBidsAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                       BidList dmbids,
                       java.util.Map dmMap)
        Constructor for the Adapter, Takes in the context which designates the activity that will use the adapter and a BidList which represents the Bids on a Tasks that will be displayed as well as a Map that is used to match Users with their Ids in order to get preferred users.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for the activity using the adapter.
        dmbids - The BidList represnting the Bids on a Tasks to be displayed, from the DataManager.
        dmMap - A map that gets users form their Id, can be used to quickly get preferred users.

                                                                            int viewType)
        Creates the ViewHolder object that will display the Objects, in this case Bids on a Tasks matching a search query.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        parent - parent means the View can contain other views
        viewType - an enumeration that tracks the type of views, in this case since we only have one view should be a constant value.
        Returns:
        The ViewHolder object that will be used.
